title: Your GenAI apps are going to scale. Will your database?

transcript.text: generative AI apps that are being built today are going to scale and so what we're thinking about is like what is it going to take for you to be okay and when I say okay meaning that you don't feel like tomorrow or the next year that you are going to feel like you made a bad choice we want you to use this database today so you can use it tomorrow in the next day and probably until the end of your application life cycle that's something that Cassandra has been doing for a long time there are clusters out there that have been up for more than 10 years I am not kidding you so we think longterm but we also don't want you to have to switch around your data so thinking about how does that happen we need it to be responsive it needs to be cheap or low cost has to be fast right that's the thing it's like the more throughput the lower cost it's going to be overall and it's going to give you a better budget for your application
